plugin.name: BarcodeScanner
plugin.description: You can use the BarcodeScanner plugin to scan different types of barcodes (using the device's camera) and get the metadata encoded in them for processing within your application.

config-file.string: No barcode scans have been recorded
Bulk mode: barcode scanned and saved
